title: When an ally is feeling down and I try to motivate him

replies.body: {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} Why don't I ever feel fabulous and flawless I WANT TO KNOW WHAT THAT FEELS!

That GIF is amazing and that guy must have been cared for his life.
He was probably a trainer, it looked like he was calling to the lion.

Actually, the official story is that the woman (yes, it's a woman) apparently rescued the lion while it was injured and came to visit it. Upon meeting with him, it sort of embraced her.

Thorn in the lion's paw all over again.
I honestly wouldn't mind a hug from a lion..... so long as the teeth and claws don't get involved.
